title.rendered: Air Vanuatu Sales office in Port Vila, Vanuatu

content.rendered:
Air Vanuatu is an airline with its head office in the Air Vanuatu House, Port Vila, Vanuatu. It is Vanuatu’s national flag carrier, operating to Australia, New Zealand and points in the South Pacific. Its main base is Bauerfield International Airport, Port Vila.
 

Air Vanuatu Port Vila, Vanuatu Address:
Ground Floor
Air Vanuatu House
Rue de Paris
Port Vila, Vanuatu

Phone:
678 20200

Fax: 678 23250

Email: reservation@airvanuatu.vu

Working hours
Mon-Fri 0730 – 1630 | Sat 0800 – 1100 | Sun CLOSED

Air Vanuatu Official website: https://www.airvanuatu.com/home/contact-us/

Air Vanuatu Online Check-in: www.AirVanuatu.com/online check-in

Note:Check In international 3 hours prior to the scheduled departure time. DOMESTIC 1 hour prior to the scheduled departure time.

Check Air Vanuatu schedule here: www.AirVanuatu.com/flight schedule

Check Air Vanuatu flight status here: www.AirVanuatu.com/flight status

For enquiries on Air Vanuatu Charter Operations, contact Email: charter@airvanuatu.vu

For enquiries on Air Vanuatu Cargo, contact Email: cargogroup@airvanuatu.vu

Air Vanuatu Holidays Enquiries Contact Phone number | Email | Business hours
